generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title>arc</title>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas" style="border:1px solid #ccc;"></canvas>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'),
			context = canvas.getContext('2d');
		canvas.width = 1000;
		canvas.height = 300;

		context.fillStyle = '#ff0000';
		context.shadowColor = '#ccc';
		context.shadowOffsetX = 5;
		context.shadowOffsetY = 5;
		context.shadowBlur = 10;

		context.arc(50,50,30,0,Math.PI/4,false);
		context.fill();


    context.beginPath();
    var x0 = 150,y0=50;
    var x1 = 250,y1=50;
    var x2 = 250,y2=100;

    context.beginPath();
    context.moveTo(x0,y0);
    context.arcTo(x1,y1,x2,y2,20);
    context.lineTo(x2,y2);

    context.stroke();


    function createBoxRadius(color,radius,x,y,width,height){
      context.beginPath();
      context.moveTo(x+radius,y);
      context.arcTo(x+width,y,x+width,y+height,radius);
      context.arcTo(x+width,y+height,x,y+height,radius);
      context.arcTo(x,y+height,x,y,radius);
      context.arcTo(x,y,x+width,y,radius);
      context.strokeStyle = color;
      context.stroke();
      context.fillStyle = color;
      context.fill();
    }

    createBoxRadius('#ff0000',10,500,50,100,100);

    createBoxRadius('#000000',10,700,50,100,100);



	</script>
</body>
</html>
